title: Dubinik®Mens Shirts Long Sleeve Shirts for Men Casual Button Down Vintage Plaid Pocket Soft Mens Button Up Shirts Long Sleeve
description: 【Size Exactly】Dubinik long sleeve shirts for men are designed to fit US sizes. If you're unsure of what size to purchase, refer to the size chart and match it to your usual clothing size. If you prefer a looser fit, consider purchasing one size larger.

【Washing Instructions and Customer Service】Each men's casual button-down shirts has been pre-shrunk during production and will not shrink after washing. These mens button down long sleeve shirts are machine or hand washable and are ironed at a low temperature. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us by clicking on the 【Dubinik】store.

【High-quality, attention to detail】These mens button up shirts long sleeve are made of high-quality cotton—soft,and breathable. The skin-friendly material will bring you the ultimate comfortable wearing experience. Each of our mens long sleeve button down shirts goes through a strict quality inspection process before shipping, so you don't need to worry about product breakage, buttons falling off, or pilling after use.

【Multiple Occasions】Men's long sleeve shirts with button down collar design. There are two buttons on the wrist for adjustable cuffs. Button-down shirts men are available in different colors: green, red ,yellow, blue, grey, black, khaki, brown, purple, and white .These men's long sleeve shirts are suitable for various occasions throughout the seasons, including spring, summer, autumn, and winter, as well as work, parties, casual events, travel, and camping.

【Feature】This men's button down shirt includes a variety of classic design elements such as plaid, pockets, casual, soft, cotton, button-down, regular fit. Mens long sleeve shirt can be used as a gift for anniversaries, Christmas, All Saints' Day, Carnival, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, for those close to you, such as father, husband, boyfriend, brother, son. Ideal for various occasions, this men's long sleeve shirt is your go-to for a casual and stylish look.
